languages.text: "Греза, навеянная мьодом, смешалась с реальностью и чарами Доппельгренделя. Как сказать тебе, что было настоящим, а что — миражом? Бились ли мы с духом или моим обезумевшим братом? Встали ли подле нас призраки павших, чтобы взвесить нашу отвагу на весах достоинства, или дурман заставил нас сражаться с ветром? Все сразу, эттфатер. На Фенрисе издавна знают, сколь зыбка грань между настоящим и легендой, и мы с тобой были в легенде".

"Dreams brought on by mjod mixed with reality and the spells of the Doppelgrendel. How can I say what was true and what was a mirage? Were we fighting against a spirit, or against my deranged brother? Did the ghosts of the fallen rise up beside us to weigh our valour on the scales of honour, or did the drug make us do battle with the wind? It is all true, Aett-Vater, or perhaps none of it was. The people of Fenris have long known how thin is the line between what is real and what is legend, and we were in a legend."
languages.original_text: "Греза, навеянная мьодом, смешалась с реальностью и чарами Доппельгренделя. Как сказать тебе, что было настоящим, а что — миражом? Бились ли мы с духом или моим обезумевшим братом? Встали ли подле нас призраки павших, чтобы взвесить нашу отвагу на весах достоинства, или дурман заставил нас сражаться с ветром? Все сразу, эттфатер. На Фенрисе издавна знают, сколь зыбка грань между настоящим и легендой, и мы с тобой были в легенде".

languages.text: «Sueños de mjod mezclados con la realidad y con los hechizos del Doppelgrendel. ¿Cómo puedo saber lo que era cierto y lo que era un espejismo? ¿Luchábamos contra un espíritu o contra mi hermano enloquecido? ¿Se levantaron los fantasmas de los caídos para medir nuestro valor con la balanza del honor, o fue la droga la que nos hizo luchar contra el viento? Es todo cierto, Aett-Vater. O tal vez nada lo fuera. La gente de Fenris sabe desde hace mucho que la línea que separa la realidad de las leyendas es muy fina. Estábamos en una leyenda».
languages.original_text: "Dreams brought on by mjod mixed with reality and the spells of the Doppelgrendel. How can I say what was true and what was a mirage? Were we fighting against a spirit, or against my deranged brother? Did the ghosts of the fallen rise up beside us to weigh our valour on the scales of honour, or did the drug make us do battle with the wind? It is all true, Aett-Vater, or perhaps none of it was. The people of Fenris have long known how thin is the line between what is real and what is legend, and we were in a legend."

traits.locale_text: «Sueños de mjod mezclados con la realidad y con los hechizos del Doppelgrendel. ¿Cómo puedo saber lo que era cierto y lo que era un espejismo? ¿Luchábamos contra un espíritu o contra mi hermano enloquecido? ¿Se levantaron los fantasmas de los caídos para medir nuestro valor con la balanza del honor, o fue la droga la que nos hizo luchar contra el viento? Es todo cierto, Aett-Vater. La gente de Fenris sabe desde hace mucho que la línea que separa la realidad de las leyendas es muy fina. Estábamos en una leyenda».
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: “是蜜酒带来的梦境与现实，以及化身者的咒语混杂在一起带来的景象。我又怎么知道何为真实，何为幻觉？我们当时是在与怨灵战斗，还是在与我发狂的兄弟战斗？是亡灵在我们身边复活，将我们的勇气放在荣耀的天平上衡量？还是我们受了烈酒的影响，在风中乱打乱撞？这一切都是真的，狼领，又或许这一切都是假的。芬里斯的人们早就清楚真实与传说之间的界限多么模糊，当时的我们就在传说之中。”
languages.original_text: "Dreams brought on by mjod mixed with reality and the spells of the Doppelgrendel. How can I say what was true and what was a mirage? Were we fighting against a spirit, or against my deranged brother? Did the ghosts of the fallen rise up beside us to weigh our valour on the scales of honour, or did the drug make us do battle with the wind? It is all true, Aett-Vater, or perhaps none of it was. The people of Fenris have long known how thin is the line between what is real and what is legend, and we were in a legend."

traits.locale_text: “是蜜酒带来的梦境与现实，以及化身者的咒语混杂在一起带来的景象。我又怎么知道何为真实，何为幻觉？我们当时是在与怨灵战斗，还是在与我发狂的兄弟战斗？是亡灵在我们身边复活，将我们的勇气放在荣耀的天平上衡量？还是我们受了烈酒的影响，在风中乱打乱撞？这一切都是真的，狼领。芬里斯的人们早就清楚真实与传说之间的界限多么模糊，当时的我们就在传说之中。”
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: 「ミョードがもたらした夢に、現実とドッペルグレンデルの魔法が混ざっていた。どれが真実でどれが幻かなんて分かるはずもない。俺が戦っていたのは精霊なのか、それとも狂った兄弟だったのか？戦死した者たちの霊が俺たちのそばに現れて、名誉という天秤で俺たちの勇気を測ったのか、それとも薬のせいで俺たちは風と戦ったのか？すべて真実なんだよ…もしくは全部ウソさ、アエット＝ヴァテル。フェンリスの者たちは、現実と伝説の間の境界がどれほど薄いかを昔から知っていた。俺たちは伝説の中にいたんだ」
languages.original_text: "Dreams brought on by mjod mixed with reality and the spells of the Doppelgrendel. How can I say what was true and what was a mirage? Were we fighting against a spirit, or against my deranged brother? Did the ghosts of the fallen rise up beside us to weigh our valour on the scales of honour, or did the drug make us do battle with the wind? It is all true, Aett-Vater, or perhaps none of it was. The people of Fenris have long known how thin is the line between what is real and what is legend, and we were in a legend."

traits.locale_text: 「ミードがもたらした夢に、現実とドッペルグレンデルの魔法が混ざっていた。どれが真実でどれが幻かなんて分かるはずもない。俺が戦っていたのは精霊なのか、それとも狂った兄弟だったのか？戦死した者たちの霊が俺たちのそばに現れて、名誉という天秤で俺たちの勇気を測ったのか、それとも薬のせいで俺たちは風と戦ったのか？すべて真実なんだよ…もしくは全部ウソさ、アエット＝ヴァテル。フェンリスの者たちは、現実と伝説の間の境界がどれほど薄いかを昔から知っていた。俺たちは伝説の中にいたんだ」
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: « Des rêveries induites par le mjod, mêlées à la réalité et aux sortilèges du doppelgrendel. Comment distinguer le vrai du faux ? Est-ce un esprit que nous avons affronté ou mon frère dément ? Les fantômes des défunts se sont-ils manifestés pour soupeser notre valeur sur la balance de l'honneur ou nous sommes-nous battus contre le vent sous l'effet de la drogue ? Tout est vrai, aett-vater, ou peut-être rien ne l'était. Les enfants de Fenris savent depuis longtemps à quel point la frontière entre mythe et réalité est ténue, et en l'occurrence, c'est dans une légende que nous nous trouvions. »
languages.original_text: "Dreams brought on by mjod mixed with reality and the spells of the Doppelgrendel. How can I say what was true and what was a mirage? Were we fighting against a spirit, or against my deranged brother? Did the ghosts of the fallen rise up beside us to weigh our valour on the scales of honour, or did the drug make us do battle with the wind? It is all true, Aett-Vater, or perhaps none of it was. The people of Fenris have long known how thin is the line between what is real and what is legend, and we were in a legend."

traits.locale_text: « Des rêveries induites par le mjod, mêlées à la réalité et aux sortilèges du doppelgrendel. Comment distinguer le vrai du faux ? Est-ce un esprit que nous avons affronté ou mon frère dément ? Les fantômes des défunts se sont-ils manifestés pour soupeser notre valeur sur la balance de l'honneur ou nous sommes-nous battus contre le vent sous l'effet de la drogue ? Tout est vrai, aett-vater. Les enfants de Fenris savent depuis longtemps à quel point la frontière entre mythe et réalité est ténue, et en l'occurrence, c'est dans une légende que nous nous trouvions. »
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.text: "Vom Mjod ausgelöste Träume vermengt mit der Realität und den Zaubern der Doppelgrendel. Wie kann ich sagen, was wahr war und was ein Trugbild? Haben wir gegen einen Geist gekämpft oder gegen meinen umnachteten Bruder? Sind die Geister der Gefallenen neben uns auferstanden, um unsere Tapferkeit auf der Waage der Ehre zu wiegen? Oder hat die Droge uns gegen den Wind kämpfen lassen? Es ist alles wahr, Aett-Vater, oder vielleicht stimmt nichts davon. Das Volk von Fenris weiß seit Langem, wie dünn die Grenze zwischen der Wirklichkeit und den Legenden ist, und wir waren in einer Legende."
languages.original_text: "Dreams brought on by mjod mixed with reality and the spells of the Doppelgrendel. How can I say what was true and what was a mirage? Were we fighting against a spirit, or against my deranged brother? Did the ghosts of the fallen rise up beside us to weigh our valour on the scales of honour, or did the drug make us do battle with the wind? It is all true, Aett-Vater, or perhaps none of it was. The people of Fenris have long known how thin is the line between what is real and what is legend, and we were in a legend."

traits.locale_text: "Vom Mjod ausgelöste Träume vermengt mit der Realität und den Zaubern der Doppelgrendel. Wie kann ich sagen, was wahr war und was ein Trugbild? Haben wir gegen einen Geist gekämpft oder gegen meinen umnachteten Bruder? Sind die Geister der Gefallenen neben uns auferstanden, um unsere Tapferkeit auf der Waage der Ehre zu wiegen? Oder hat die Droge uns gegen den Wind kämpfen lassen? Es ist alles wahr, Aett-Vater. Das Volk von Fenris weiß seit langem, wie dünn die Grenze zwischen der Wirklichkeit und den Legenden ist, und wir waren in einer Legende."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion

languages.original_text: "Dreams brought on by mjod mixed with reality and the spells of the Doppelgrendel. How can I say what was true and what was a mirage? Were we fighting against a spirit, or against my deranged brother? Did the ghosts of the fallen rise up beside us to weigh our valour on the scales of honour, or did the drug make us do battle with the wind? It is all true, Aett-Vater, or perhaps none of it was. The people of Fenris have long known how thin is the line between what is real and what is legend, and we were in a legend."

languages.text: "Mjod ile gerçekliğin karışımından ve Suretçalan'ın büyülerinden doğan rüyalar gördün. Neyin gerçek neyin serap olduğunu bilemem. Bir ruha karşı mı yoksa benim meczup kardeşime karşı mı savaşıyorduk? Düşenlerin hayaletleri, onur terazisinde cesaretimizi ölçmek için mi dikiliyordu yoksa o ilaç bizi rüzgâra karşı kürek çekmeye mi zorluyordu? Hepsi doğru da olabilir yanlış da Aett-Vater. Fenris halkı, gerçekle efsane arasındaki çizginin ne kadar ince olduğunun ve bir efsanede yaşadığımızın uzun zamandır farkındadır."
languages.original_text: "Dreams brought on by mjod mixed with reality and the spells of the Doppelgrendel. How can I say what was true and what was a mirage? Were we fighting against a spirit, or against my deranged brother? Did the ghosts of the fallen rise up beside us to weigh our valour on the scales of honour, or did the drug make us do battle with the wind? It is all true, Aett-Vater, or perhaps none of it was. The people of Fenris have long known how thin is the line between what is real and what is legend, and we were in a legend."

traits.locale_text: "Mjod ve gerçekliğin karışımından doğan rüyalar ve Suretçalan'ın büyüleriydi. Neyin doğru neyin serap olduğunu bilemem. Bir ruha karşı mı savaşıyorduk yoksa benim meczup kardeşime karşı mı? Düşenlerin hayaletleri, onur terazisinde cesaretimizi ölçmek için mi dikiliyordu yoksa o ilaç bizi rüzgâra karşı kürek çekmeye mi zorladı? Hepsi doğru Aett-Vater, belki de hepsi yanlış. Fenris halkı gerçekle efsane arasındaki çizginin ne kadar ince olduğunun ve bir efsanede yaşadığımızın uzun zamandır farkındadır."
traits.speaker: UlfarCompanion
